attributes.action: Extend the school day until 5pm resulting in the removal of school homework
attributes.background: If the school day is extended, homework could be removed,  resulting in family time at home and children will be less stressed

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because schools already have the power to set their own hours and policies on homework. This is therefore a decision for schools and not the UK Government or Parliament.

You could start a new petition calling for all schools to be required to finish at 5 pm and for homework to be banned if that's something you would to see happen.
